feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [LIM1][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 3, 06:00 - 10:00 UTC

Jul 5, 21:18 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/08/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 03/08/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers might experience twice of a few seconds of input/output freeze for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on multiple network equipment.

entry.title: [RBX2D][Hosted Private Cloud] - Datastores Outage
entry.content:
Jul 14, 16:39 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 14/07/2023 08:20 UTC
End Time : 14/07/2023 16:38 UTC
Service impact : Several datastores on RBX2D were currently unreachable.

Jul 14, 15:03 UTC
Update - 1 server is still impacted in cluster10021. No more impact is observed on other servers.
Our teams are currently working to solve the problem.

Jul 14, 09:52 UTC
Identified - The issue is caused by a failure on a cooling module and a fix is being implemented.

Jul 14, 08:54 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 14/07/2023 08:20 UTC
User impact : Several datastores on RBX2D are currently unreachable.
Technical impact :RBX2D
Ongoing Actions: Under investigation.

entry.title: [P19][Hosted Private Cloud] - tete-3852a
entry.content:
Jul 12, 06:40 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 12/07/2023 04:55 UTC
End Time : 12/07/2023 06:40 UTC
Service impact : VMs and datastores were temporarily unreachable
Root cause : Hardware issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
